metadata.title: CVE-2022-30780 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Lighttpd 1.4.56 through 1.4.58 allows a remote attacker to cause a denialof service (CPU consumption from stuck connections) becauseconnection_read_header_more in connections.c has a typo that disrupts useof multiple read operations on large headers.

criterions.comment: lighttpd package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
